WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

We are closing this work item as this was changed in Prism 4.1 (http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/releases/view/55576). The exception message is now:

"The IRegionAdapter for the type {0} is not registered in the region adapter mappings. You can register an IRegionAdapter for this control by overriding the ConfigureRegionAdapterMappings method in the bootstrapper."

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
WorkItem.Description:
I struggled some time to find the source of the KeyNotFoundException raised here.
Please return a message that looks something like this "Unsupported control type" and include the name of the type that is the input of GetMapping
